item.title: Data Loss - Corrupt card
item.description:
Hye there.. well lets begin as you can guess from the title.. I can assure you that it was completely my fault.. About the sd card its the one that you see in the image, so lets get into more detail shall we..

why?.. you may ask

i was experimenting with some stuff relating to sim card tray.. that involved removing and inserting the micro sd card rapidly. i never believed in safely un-mounting the sd card.. BOY did i learn a lesson here.

repeated tampering with the card made the card fail.. #rip

Cause

Apparently the card had a safety feature..which is if the card detects phase of data loss it goes into read mode and remains in that state forever. apparently the card i had was produced mainly for photography and stuff.. the kid that i was..when i bought the card..i didn’t know all these stuffs.
